00030 /**
00031  * Frontend template section
00032  * 
00033  * This class is not supposed to be instanciated by itself. Please use the
00034  * tx_oop_Frontend_Template_File class instead.
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 class tx_oop_Frontend_Template_Section implements ArrayAccess
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * The instance of the tslib_cObj class
00045      */
00046     protected $_cObj            = NULL;
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * The template resource
00050      */
00051     protected $_templateContent = NULL;
00052     
00053     /**
00054      * The section markers
00055      */
00056     protected $_markers         = array();
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * The section name
00060      */
00061     protected $_name            = '';
00062     
00063     /**
00064      * Class constructor
00065      * 
00066      * @param   string      The section's name
00067      * @param   tslib_cObj  The instance of tslib_cObj
00068      * @param   string      The template content
00069      * @return  NULL
00070      */
00071     public function __construct( $name, tslib_cObj $cObj, $templateContent )
00072     {
00073         // Stores the section name
00074         $this->_name            = ( string )$name;
00075         
00076         // Stores the content object
00077         $this->_cObj            = $cObj;
00078         
00079         // Stores the template content
00080         $this->_templateContent = $templateContent;
00081     }
00082     
00083     /**
00084      * 
00085      */
00086     public function __get( $name )
00087     {
00088         // Ensures we have a string
00089         $name = '###' . ( string )$name . '###';
00090         
00091         // Checks if the marker already exist
00092         if( !isset( $this->_markers[ $name ] ) ) {
00093             
00094             // No such marker
00095             return '';
00096         }
00097         
00098         // Returns the marker's value
00099         return $this->_markers[ $name ];
00100     }
00101     
00102     /**
00103      * 
00104      */
00105     public function __set( $name, $value )
00106     {
00107         // Ensures we have a string
00108         $name = '###' . ( string )$name . '###';
00109         
00110         // Stores the marker value
00111         $this->_markers[ $name ] = ( string )$value;
00112     }
00113     
00114     /**
00115      * 
00116      */
00117     public function __isset( $name )
00118     {
00119         // Ensures we have a string
00120         $name = '###' . ( string )$name . '###';
00121         
00122         // Checks for the marker
00123         return isset( $this->_markers[ $name ] );
00124     }
00125     
00126     /**
00127      * 
00128      */
00129     public function __unset( $name )
00130     {
00131         // Ensures we have a string
00132         $name = '###' . ( string )$name . '###';
00133         
00134         // Removes the marker
00135         unset( $this->_markers[ $name ] );
00136     }
00137     
00138     /**
00139      * 
00140      */
00141     public function __toString()
00142     {
00143         // Gets the template subpart
00144         $subpart = $this->_cObj->getSubpart(
00145             $this->_templateContent,
00146             $this->_name
00147         );
00148         
00149         // Returns the substituted section
00150         return $this->_cObj->substituteMarkerArrayCached(
00151             $subpart,
00152             array(),
00153             $this->_markers,
00154             array()
00155         );
00156     }
00157     
00158     /**
00159      * 
00160      */
00161     public function offsetGet( $name )
00162     {
00163         return $this->$name;
00164     }
00165     
00166     /**
00167      * 
00168      */
00169     public function offsetSet( $name, $value )
00170     {
00171         $this->$name = $value;
00172     }
00173     
00174     /**
00175      * 
00176      */
00177     public function offsetExists( $name )
00178     {
00179         return isset( $this->$name );
00180     }
00181     
00182     /**
00183      * 
00184      */
00185     public function offsetUnset( $name )
00186     {
00187         unset( $this->$name );
00188     }
00189     
00190     /**
00191      * 
00192      */
00193     public function render()
00194     {
00195         return ( string )$this;
00196     }
00197 }
